Hi,

I am working on a bioinformatics problem, but it's easier to talk abou=
t it in graph theory terms....

I have a graph with a large number of nodes=
 (~9000), and about 3000 edges between the nodes... I am planning to feed t=
his as training data, and then see if the resulting NN will predict the pro=
bability of an edge given any 2 nodes.

I have questions of how to encode t=
he inputs... do I create an input array of 9000 inputs and pass in the coup=
le of 1's corresponding to the nodes, or do I choose 2 inputs & pass in the=
 node numbers?

Thanks,
Mridul.
